definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: What if anything do voles tell us about human monogamy?
sentences.chinese: 田鼠的例子對人類的一夫一妻行爲有什麼樣的提示呢？

sentences.english: Infant dependency in humans may have lead to the common pattern that we see in humans of pair-bonding.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒依賴大人可能導致了我們人類的一夫一妻關係。

definition: to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)

Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
to carry on one's ancestral line
